<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left">

</font></div>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">*
</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The sum of the earnings (loss) per share for each of the individual
quarters does not equal earnings per share for the fiscal year due to rounding.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">17.</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160; </font>Subsequent
Events:</b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Northwest Letter of Intent</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On April&nbsp;20, 2005, Holdings and Mesaba executed a non-binding
letter of intent with Northwest to allow Mesaba to operate 15 Bombardier CRJ-200
regional jets (&#147;CRJ&#148;) under the Northwest Airlink banner, with exclusive rights
to the next 20 CRJ-200 or CRJ-440 aircraft Northwest Airlines may order.&#160; Mesaba expects to lease the aircraft from
Northwest and expects the first aircraft to enter service before the end of
2005.&#160; Mesaba expects to enter into a new
10-year omnibus airline services agreement with Northwest covering the
operation of the CRJs, Saabs and RJ85s that will replace the existing Airlink
Agreement and the Jet Agreement, which are set to expire in 2007.&#160; As part of the letter of intent, Mesaba
agreed to incur the costs necessary to bring the new CRJ fleet into service.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">61</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='61',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\05-8337-1\task467693\8337-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 14 10:26 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Holdings and Mesaba are currently negotiating the definitive new
omnibus airline services agreement with Northwest, which is subject to final
approval by all parties.&#160; Upon execution
of the definitive agreement, Holdings expects to amend the currently
outstanding warrants held by Northwest to reduce the number of shares of the
Company&#146;s common stock issuable upon exercise from 4,151,922 shares exercisable
at prices from $7.25 to $21.25 per share to an aggregate of 4,112,500 shares exercisable
at a price of $8.74 per share.&#160; The
warrants are expected to expire ten years from the date of the definitive
airline services agreement.&#160; Sixty
percent of the shares are expected to become exercisable upon the delivery of
the 15<sup>th</sup> CRJ aircraft to Mesaba, and an additional 4% of the shares are
expected to become exercisable with each subsequent delivery of the next ten
CRJ aircraft.&#160; Pursuant to the letter of intent,
Holdings also agreed to enter into a registration rights agreement to register
the shares of stock currently held by Northwest and the shares of stock that
will be issuable to Northwest upon exercise of the warrants.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Letter of Credit</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On April&nbsp;22, 2005, Holdings obtained a $1.9 million letter of
credit to guarantee certain obligations related to Big Sky&#146;s Beechcraft 1900D
aircraft.&#160; As collateral for this letter
of credit, Holdings obtained a $2.1 million U.S. Treasury note.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Litigation Settlement</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On May&nbsp;6, 2005, the Company executed a final settlement agreement
with an investment advisor who had, on the Company&#146;s behalf, purchased debt
securities issued by WorldCom in the principal amount of $3.2 million.&#160; In March&nbsp;2003, the debt securities were
sold for approximately $0.8 million.&#160; On May&nbsp;9,
2005, the Company received a settlement in the amount of $1.8 million in
cash.&#160; The Company will recognize the
recovery resulting from the settlement in the first quarter of fiscal 2006.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">62</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='62',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\05-8337-1\task467693\8337-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 14 10:26 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item9_081633"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 9</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">. CHANGES IN AND DISAGREEMENTS WITH ACCOUNTANTS ON ACCOUNTING AND
FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Not applicable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item9a_081638"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 9A</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">. CONTROLS AND PROCEDURES</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Evaluation of Disclosure Controls Procedures</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of March&nbsp;31, 2005, the Company conducted an evaluation under
the supervision and with the participation of the Company&#146;s management,
including the Company&#146;s Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer,
regarding the effectiveness of the design and operation of the Company&#146;s
disclosure controls and procedures pursuant to Rules&nbsp;13a-15(b)&nbsp;of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;).&#160; Based upon that evaluation, the Chief
Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer concluded that the Company&#146;s
disclosure controls and procedures were effective as of the date of such
evaluation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Changes in Internal Controls</font></i></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">While preparing its Form&nbsp;10-Q for the period ended December&nbsp;31,
2004, the Company identified deficiencies in the Company&#146;s internal control
over financial reporting that resulted in errors in accounting for aircraft
leases that were corrected in the restated condensed consolidated financial
statements as disclosed in the Company&#146;s Form&nbsp;10-Q for the period
ended December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#160; As a
result, the Company concluded that the Company did not maintain effective internal
control over financial reporting as of December&nbsp;31, 2004, based on
criteria established in <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Internal Control -
Integrated Framework</font></i> issued by the Committee of Sponsoring
Organizations of the Treadway Commission.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">During the quarter ended March&nbsp;31, 2005, the Company took the
following corrective actions to improve its internal control over financial
reporting related to its controls over the accounting for leases and other
material contracts:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .6in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">&#149;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>reviewed
the existing controls and procedures related to the accounting for leases and
other material contracts;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .6in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">&#149;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>obtained
additional training for the Company&#146;s legal and accounting staff on complex
accounting matters, including the accounting for leases and other material
contracts; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .6in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.3in;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">&#149;</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>modified
existing controls and procedures to ensure appropriate accounting for leases
and other material contracts at inception.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The changes above have materially affected the Company&#146;s internal
control over financial reporting.&#160; There
were no other changes in internal control over financial reporting that had a
material affect on internal control over financial reporting or are reasonably
likely to have a material affect on internal control over financial reporting.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item9b_081643"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 9B</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">. OTHER INFORMATION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">None</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Partiii_081645"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PART&nbsp;III</font></b></a></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item10_081651"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 10</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">. DIRECTORS AND EXECUTIVE OFFICERS OF THE REGISTRANT</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Information regarding the directors and executive officers of the
Company is incorporated herein by reference to the descriptions set forth under
the caption &#147;Election of Directors&#148; in the Proxy Statement to be issued in
connection with the 2005 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the &#147;2005 Proxy
Statement&#148;).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">63</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item11__081655"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 11.</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Information regarding executive compensation is incorporated herein by
reference to the information set forth under the caption &#147;Compensation of
Executive Officers&#148; in the 2005 Proxy Statement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item12__081656"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 12.</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> SECURITY OWNERSHIP OF CERTAIN BENEFICIAL OWNERS AND MANAGEMENT AND
RELATED SHAREHOLDER MATTERS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Information regarding security ownership of certain beneficial owners
and management of the Company is incorporated herein by reference to the
information set forth under the caption &#147;Security Ownership of Certain Beneficial
Owners and Management&#148; in the 2005 Proxy Statement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item13__081659"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 13.</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED TRANSACTIONS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Information regarding certain relationships and related transactions
with the Company is incorporated herein by reference to the information set
forth under the caption &#147;Certain Transactions&#148; in the 2005 Proxy Statement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item14__081701"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 14.</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTANT FEES AND SERVICES</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Information regarding principal accountant fees and services is
incorporated herein by reference to the information set forth under the caption
&#147;Ratification of Selection of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm&#148; in
the 2005 Proxy Statement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Partiv_081704"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PART&nbsp;IV</font></b></a></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><a name="Item15_081709"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 15</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;">. EXHIBITS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENT SCHEDULES</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;(1)&nbsp;Financial Statements</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Included in Item 8 of Part&nbsp;II of this
Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K are the following:&#160; </font>Report of Management on
Internal Control Over Financial Reporting, Reports of Independent Registered
Public Accounting Firm on Consolidated Financial Statements and Internal
Control Over Financial Reporting, Consolidated Balance Sheets, Consolidated
Statements of Operations, Consolidated Statements of Shareholders&#146; Equity,
Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows and Notes to Consolidated Financial
Statements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;(2)&nbsp;Financial Statement Schedules</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The information required in Schedule&nbsp;II
is included in Item 8 of Part&nbsp;II of this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;(3)&nbsp;Exhibits</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Exhibits filed or incorporated by reference herewith are as
specified in the Exhibit&nbsp;Index.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">64</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:90.48%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Aircraft Hangar Facility Lease Agreement between Metropolitan
  Airports Commission Minneapolis - St. Paul and Mesaba Aviation,&nbsp;Inc.
  dated September&nbsp;30, 2002. Incorporated by reference to Exhibit&nbsp;10Y
  to the Company&#146;s Form&nbsp;10-Q for the quarter ended June&nbsp;30, 2003.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.34%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.20</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:90.48%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Lease between Spectrum Investment Group, L.L.C. and Mesaba
  Aviation,&nbsp;Inc. entered into as of April&nbsp;25, 2003. Incorporated by
  reference to Exhibit&nbsp;10Z to the Company&#146;s Form&nbsp;10-Q for the quarter
  ended June&nbsp;30, 2003.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.34%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.21</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.18%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:90.48%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amendment to Regional Jet Services Agreement by and among MAIR
  Holdings,&nbsp;Inc., Mesaba Aviation,&nbsp;Inc. and Northwest
  Airlines,&nbsp;Inc., dated October&nbsp;7, 2003. Incorporated by reference to
  Exhibit&nbsp;10.1 to the Company&#146;s Form&nbsp;8-K/A filed October&nbsp;9,
  2003.</font></p>
  </td>

  <td width="7%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:7.34%;">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='68',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\05-8337-1\task467693\8337-1-ba-05.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Jun 14 10:26 2005' -->
