<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.3</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MESABA
HOLDINGS, INC.<br>
2000 STOCK INCENTIVE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;1<br>DEFINED TERMS</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition to the other definitions contained herein,
the following definitions shall apply:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Award Agreement</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Award Agreement&#148; means the document
that evidences an Award and which sets forth the terms, conditions, and
limitations relating to such Award.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Award</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Award&#148; shall mean any award or
benefit granted in accordance with the terms of the Plan.&#160; Awards under the Plan may be in the form of (i)&nbsp;Stock
Options; (ii)&nbsp;Restricted Stock; (iii)&nbsp;Stock Appreciation Rights; (iv)&nbsp;Other
Stock Based Awards and/or (v)&nbsp;Tax Offset Payments.&#160; The terms and conditions of the Award shall
be set forth in an Award Agreement.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Board</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Board&#148; shall mean the Board of
Directors of the Company.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Code</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Code&#148; shall mean the Internal
Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.&#160; A
reference to any provision of the Code shall include reference to any successor
provision of the Code.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.5</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Committee</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Committee&#148; shall mean a committee
described in Section&nbsp;11.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.6</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Company</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Company&#148; shall mean Mesaba Holdings,&nbsp;Inc.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.7</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Covered</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;"> <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Shares</font></b></font></i>.&#160;
The term &#147;Covered Shares&#148; shall mean the number of shares of Stock that
an Eligible Individual may purchase pursuant to an Option.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Director</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Director&#148; shall mean a member of
the Company&#146;s Board.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.9</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Eligible</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;"> <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Individual</font></b></font></i>.&#160;
The term &#147;Eligible Individual&#148; shall mean (a)&nbsp;any common law
employee, prospective employee, or officer of the Company, (b)&nbsp;members of
the Company&#146;s Board, (c)&nbsp;consultants and advisors to the Company, and (d)&nbsp;employees
of any Related Company or business partner of the Company.&#160; All Eligible Individuals must be natural
persons who provide bona fide services to the Company or a Related
Company.&#160; In addition, the services
provided to the Company or Related Company must not be in connection with an
offer or sale of securities in a capital raising transaction and must not
directly or indirectly promote or maintain a market for the Company&#146;s
Stock.&#160; An Award may be granted to an
Eligible Individual prior to the date the Eligible Individual performs services
for the Company or Related Company, provided that such Award shall not become
vested prior to the date the Eligible Individual first performs such services.</h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-8337-1\task455162\8337-1-ko.htm',USER='schellamuthu',CD='May 28 13:01 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Exchange</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;"> <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Act</font></b></font></i>.&#160; The
term &#147;Exchange Act&#148; shall mean the Securities Act of 1934, as amended.</h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.11</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Exercise</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;"> <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Price</font></b></font></i>.&#160; The
term &#147;Exercise Price&#148; shall mean the exercise price of each Option granted
under Section&nbsp;4 established by the Committee and determined by any
reasonable method established by the Committee at the time the Option is
granted.&#160; Options granted pursuant to Section&nbsp;4
of the Plan shall not have an Exercise Price of less than 100% of the Fair
Market Value of the Company&#146;s Stock on the date the Option is granted.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.12</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Fair</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;"> <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Market</font></b>  <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Value</font></b></font></i>.&#160; The term &#147;Fair Market Value&#148; of a share of
Stock on a given date shall mean the closing price of the share of Stock as
reported on the<b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font></b>Nasdaq Stock Market on such date,
if the share of Stock is then quoted on the Nasdaq Stock Market or, if the
market is closed on that date, the closing price of the share of Stock on the
previous trading day.&#160; If the Stock is
not listed on the Nasdaq Stock Market, Fair Market Value shall be determined in
good faith by the Board or Committee.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.13</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Incentive</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;"> <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Stock</font></b>  <b><font style="font-weight:bold;">Option</font></b></font></i>.&#160; The term &#147;Incentive Stock Option&#148; or &#147;ISO&#148;
shall mean an Option that is intended to satisfy the requirements of Section&nbsp;422(b)&nbsp;of
the Code.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.14</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Non-Employee Director</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Non-Employee Director&#148; shall mean a
&#147;non-employee director&#148; as defined in Rule&nbsp;16b-3(b)(3)(i)&nbsp;of the
Exchange Act.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.15</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Non-Qualified Stock Option</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i>&#160; The term &#147;Non-Qualified
Stock Option&#148; or &#147;NSO&#148; shall mean an Option that is not intended to satisfy the
requirements applicable to an &#147;incentive stock option&#148; described in Section&nbsp;422(b)&nbsp;of
the Code.&#160; NSO grants may be awarded to
any Eligible Individual.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.16</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Option</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i>&#160; The term &#147;Option&#148; or &#147;Stock Option&#148; shall
mean an ISO or NSO granted pursuant to the Plan.&#160; The grant of an Option entitles the Eligible
Individual to purchase shares of Stock at an Exercise Price established by the
Committee.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.17</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Other Stock Based Award</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i>&#160; The term &#147;Other
Stock Based Award&#148; shall mean an Award, granted pursuant to Section&nbsp;8,
other than on Option, Restricted Stock or SAR, that is paid with, valued in
whole or in part by reference to, or is otherwise based on Stock.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.18</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Performance Award</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Performance Award&#148; shall mean an
award or grant of shares based upon the achievement of performance objectives,
as contemplated by Section&nbsp;5.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.19</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Plan</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i>&#160; The term &#147;Plan&#148; shall mean this 2000 Stock
Incentive Plan.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.20</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Related Company</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Related Company&#148; shall mean any
corporation other than the Company and any partnership, joint venture or other
entity in which the Company owns, directly or indirectly, at least a 20%
beneficial ownership interest.&#160; A Related
Company includes a subsidiary of the Company and an unbroken chain of corporations
beginning with the</h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Company if each of
the corporations other than the last corporation in the unbroken chain owns 50%
or more of the voting stock in one of the other corporations in such chain.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.21</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Stock</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;stock&#148; shall mean shares of common
stock, $.01 par value, of the Company.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.22</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Stock Appreciation Right</font></i></b>.&#160; The term &#147;Stock Appreciation Right&#148; or &#147;SAR&#148;
shall mean the grant, pursuant to Section&nbsp;7, of a right to receive a
payment from the Company, in the form of Stock, cash or a combination of both,
equal to the excess of the Fair Market Value of one or more shares of Stock
over the exercise price of such shares under the terms of such Stock
Appreciation Right.</h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;2<br>PURPOSE</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Mesaba Holdings,&nbsp;Inc. 2000 Stock Incentive
Plan has been established by Mesaba Holdings,&nbsp;Inc. to (i)&nbsp;attract and
retain individuals eligible to participate in the Plan; (ii)&nbsp;motivate
Eligible Individuals, by means of appropriate incentives, to achieve long-range
goals; (iii)&nbsp;provide incentive compensation opportunities that are
competitive with those of other similar companies; and (iv)&nbsp;further
identify Eligible Individuals&#146; interests with those of the Company&#146;s other
shareholders through compensation that is based on the Company&#146;s common stock;
and thereby promote the long-term financial interest of the Company and any
Related Company, including the growth in value of the Company&#146;s equity and
enhancement of long-term shareholder return.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;3<br>PARTICIPATION</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to the terms and conditions of the Plan, the
Committee may determine and designate, from time to time, Eligible Individuals
who will be granted one or more Awards under the Plan at the Exercise
Price.&#160; In its sole discretion and
without shareholder approval, the Committee may grant to an Eligible Individual
any Award or Awards permitted under the provisions of the Plan. Awards may be
granted as alternatives to or replacement of Awards outstanding under the Plan,
or any other plan or arrangement of the Company or Related Company (including a
plan or arrangement of a business or entity, all or a portion of which is
acquired by the Company or a Related Company).&#160;
Only employees are eligible to be granted Incentive Stock Options.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;4<br>STOCK OPTIONS</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">General</font></i></b>.&#160; The grant of an Option entitles the Eligible
Individual to purchase shares of Stock at an Exercise Price established by the
Committee.&#160; Any Option awarded to
Eligible Individuals under this Section&nbsp;4 may be either NSOs or ISOs, as
determined in the discretion of the Committee.&#160;
To the extent that any Stock Option does not qualify as an ISO, it shall
constitute an NSO.</h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-8337-1\task455162\8337-1-ko.htm',USER='schellamuthu',CD='May 28 13:01 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Option Awards</font></i></b>.&#160; Subject to the following provisions, Options
awarded under the Plan shall be in such form and shall have such terms as the
Committee may determine and specify in an Award Agreement entered into between
the Eligible Individual and the Company.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Exercise of an Option.</font></i>&#160;
An Option shall be exercisable in accordance with such terms and conditions
and during such periods as may be established by the Committee.&#160; In no event shall any fraction of a share of
Stock be issued upon the exercise of an Option.&#160;
An Option must be exercised for at least 100 shares of Stock, or such
lesser number of shares of Stock if the remaining portion of an Option is for
fewer than 100 shares of Stock.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Exercise Price</font></i>. <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#160;</font></i>The Exercise Price of an Option
granted under this Section&nbsp;4 shall be established by the Committee or
shall be determined by a method established by the Committee at the time the
Option is granted, except that the Exercise Price for an ISO shall not be less
than 100% of the Fair Market Value of the Company&#146;s Stock on the date of grant.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Payment of Option Exercise Price</font></i>.&#160; The payment of the Exercise Price of an
Option granted under this Section&nbsp;4 shall be subject to the following:</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subject
to the following provisions of this Subsection&nbsp;4.2(c), the full Exercise
Price for shares of Stock purchased upon the exercise of any Option shall be paid
at the time of such exercise or such other time as approved by the Committee.</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Payment
of the Exercise Price shall be made in such manner as the Committee may provide
in the Award, which may include cash (including cash equivalents), tendering of
shares of Stock acceptable to the Committee and either already owned by the
Eligible Individual or subject to Awards hereunder (so-called &#147;cashless&#148; or &#147;immaculate&#148;
exercise methods), and any other manner permitted by law and approved by the
Committee, or any combination of the foregoing.&#160;
If the Company determines that a Stock Option may be exercised using
shares of Restricted Stock, then unless the Committee provides otherwise, the
shares received upon the exercise of a Stock Option which are paid for using
Restricted Stock shall be restricted in accordance with the original terms of
the Restricted Stock Award.&#160; In the case
of any deferred payment arrangement, interest shall be compounded at least
annually and shall be charged at the minimum rate of interest necessary to
avoid the treatment as interest, under any applicable provisions of the Code,
of any amounts other than amounts stated to be interest under the deferred
payment arrangement.</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>An
Eligible Individual may elect to pay the Exercise Price upon the exercise of an
Option by irrevocably authorizing a third party</h4>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-8337-1\task455162\8337-1-ko.htm',USER='schellamuthu',CD='May 28 13:01 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to sell shares of
Stock (or a sufficient portion of the shares) acquired upon exercise of the
Option and remit to the Company a sufficient portion of the sale proceeds to
pay the entire Exercise Price and any tax withholding resulting from such
exercise.</font></h4>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Settlement of Option</font></i>.&#160;
Shares of Stock delivered pursuant to the exercise of an Option shall be
subject to such conditions, restrictions and contingencies as the Committee, in
its discretion,&#160; may establish in
addition to such conditions, restrictions, and contingencies set forth in the
Award Agreement.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Reload Options</font></i>. The Committee may grant &#147;reload&#148; options,
pursuant to the terms and conditions established by the Committee and any
applicable requirements of Rule&nbsp;16b-3 of the Exchange Act (&#147;Rule&nbsp;16b-3&#148;)
or any other applicable law.&#160; The
Eligible Individual would be granted a new Option when the payment of the
Exercise Price of a previously granted Option is made by the delivery of shares
of the Company&#146;s Stock owned by the Eligible Individual pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.2(c)(2)&nbsp;hereof
and/or when shares of the Company&#146;s Stock are tendered or forfeited as payment
of the amount to be withheld under applicable income tax laws in connection
with the exercise of an Option.&#160; The new
Option would be an Option to purchase the number of shares not exceeding the
sum of (i)&nbsp;the number of shares of the Company&#146;s Stock provided as
consideration upon the exercise of the previously granted Option to which such &#147;reload&#148;
option relates and (ii)&nbsp;the number of shares of the Company&#146;s Stock
tendered or forfeited as payment of the amount to be withheld under applicable
income tax laws in connection with the exercise of the Option to which such &#147;reload&#148;
option relates.&#160; &#147;Reload&#148; options may be
granted with respect to Options granted under this Plan.&#160; Such &#147;reload&#148; options shall have a per share
exercise price equal to the Fair Market Value as of the date of grant of the
new Option.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Vesting</font></i>.&#160; Eligible
Individuals shall vest in all Options in accordance with the terms and
conditions of the Award Agreement entered into by and between the Eligible
Individual and the Company.&#160; The total
number of shares of Stock subject to an Option may, but need not, vest and
therefore become exercisable in periodic installments that may, but need not,
be equal.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Option Term</font></i>.&#160; The term
of each Option shall be fixed by the Committee.&#160;
In the event that the Plan is terminated pursuant to terms and
conditions of Section&nbsp;12, the Plan shall remain in effect as long as any
Awards under it are outstanding.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Termination of Employment</font></i>.&#160;
Following the termination of Eligible Individual&#146;s employment with the
Company or a Related Company, the</h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-8337-1\task455162\8337-1-ko.htm',USER='schellamuthu',CD='May 28 13:01 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Option shall be
exercisable to the extent determined by the Committee and specified in the
Award Agreement.&#160; The Committee may
provide different post-termination exercise provisions with respect to
termination of employment for different reasons.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Incentive Stock Options.&#160; </font></i>ISO
grants may only be awarded to employees of the Company, a &#147;parent corporation,&#148;
or a &#147;subsidiary corporation&#148; as those terms are defined in Sections 424(e)&nbsp;and
424(f)&nbsp;of the Code.&#160; In order for an
employee to be eligible to receive an ISO grant, the employee must be employed
by the Company, parent corporation, or subsidiary corporation during the period
beginning on the date the Option is granted and ending on the day three months
prior to the date such Option is exercised.<i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#160; </font></i>Notwithstanding the provisions of Section&nbsp;4.2,
no ISO shall (i)&nbsp;have an Exercise Price which is less than 100% of the
Fair Market Value of the Stock on the date of the ISO Award, (ii)&nbsp;be
exercisable more than ten (10)&nbsp;years after the ISO is awarded, or (iii)&nbsp;be
awarded more than ten (10)&nbsp;years after the Effective Date of this
Plan.&#160; No ISO awarded to an employee who
owns more than 10% of the total combined voting power of all classes of Stock
of the Company, its &#147;parent corporation&#148; or any &#147;subsidiary corporation&#148; shall (i)&nbsp;have
an Exercise Price of less than 110% of the Fair Market Value of the Stock on
the date of the ISO Award or (ii)&nbsp;be exercisable more than five (5)&nbsp;years
after the date of the ISO Award.&#160;
Notwithstanding Section&nbsp;10.7, no ISO shall be transferable other
than by will and the laws of descent and distribution.&#160; To the extent that the aggregate fair market
value (determined at the time of grant) of shares of Stock with respect to ISOs
are exercisable for the first time by the employee during any calendar year, in
combination with shares first exercisable under all other plans of the Company
and any Related Company, exceeds $100,000, such Options shall be treated as
NSOs.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(j)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i><font style="font-style:italic;">Early Exercise</font></i>.&#160; The
Option may, but need not, include a provision whereby the Eligible Individual
may elect at any time prior to his or her termination of employment with the
Company to exercise the Option as to any part or all of the shares of Stock
subject to the Option prior to the full vesting of the Option.&#160; Any unvested shares of Stock so purchased may
be subject to a repurchase option in favor of the Company or to any other
restrictions the Committee determines to be appropriate.</h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;5<br>PERFORMANCE AWARDS</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Committee shall have the right to designate Awards
as &#147;Performance Awards.&#148;&#160; The grant or
vesting of a Performance Award shall be subject to the achievement of
performance objectives established by the Committee based on one or more of the
following criteria, in each case applied to the Company on a consolidated basis
or to a business unit, as specified by the Committee in an Award Agreement, and
which the Committee may use as an absolute measure, as a measure of improvement
relative to prior performance, or as a measure of comparable</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-8337-1\task455162\8337-1-ko.htm',USER='schellamuthu',CD='May 28 13:01 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">performance relative to a peer group of companies:&#160; sales, operating profits, operating profits
before interest expenses and taxes, net earnings, earnings per share, return on
equity, return on assets, return on invested capital, total shareholder return,
cash flow, debt to equity ratio, market share, stock price, economic value
added, and market value added.&#160; The terms
and conditions of a Performance Award shall be set forth in an Award Agreement
entered into between the Company and the Eligible Individual.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;6<br>RESTRICTED STOCK</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to the following provisions, the Committee may
grant Awards of Restricted Stock to an Eligible Individual in such form and on
such terms and conditions as the Committee may determine and specify in a
Restricted Stock Award Agreement entered into between the Company and the
Eligible Individual:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Restricted Stock Award shall specify the number of shares of Restricted Stock
to be awarded, the price, if any, to be paid by the Eligible Individual and the
date or dates on which, or the conditions upon the satisfaction of which, the
Restricted Stock will vest.&#160; The grant
and/or the vesting of Restricted Stock may be conditioned upon the completion
of a specified period of service with the Company or a Related Company, upon
the attainment of specified performance objectives or upon such other criteria
as the Committee may determine.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Stock
certificates representing the Restricted Stock awarded to an Eligible
Individual shall be registered in the Eligible Individual&#146;s name, but the
Committee may direct that such certificates be held by the Company or its
designee on behalf of the Eligible Individual.&#160;
Except as may be permitted by the Committee, no share of Restricted
Stock may be sold, transferred, assigned, pledged or otherwise encumbered by an
Eligible Individual until such share has vested in accordance with the terms of
the Restricted Stock Award.&#160; At the time
the Restricted Stock vests, a certificate for such vested shares shall be
delivered to the Eligible Individual (or his or her designated beneficiary in
the event of death), free from the restrictions imposed thereon except that any
restrictions under federal or state securities laws shall continue to apply.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Committee may provide that the Eligible Individual shall have the right to vote
or receive dividends on Restricted Stock.&#160;
Unless the Committee provides otherwise, Stock received as a dividend
on, or in connection with a stock split of, Restricted Stock shall be subject
to the same restrictions as the Restricted Stock.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Except
as may be provided by the Committee, in the event of an Eligible Individual&#146;s
termination of employment or relationship with the Company prior to all of his
or her Restricted Stock becoming vested, or in the event any conditions to the
vesting of Restricted Stock have not been satisfied</h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-8337-1\task455162\8337-1-ko.htm',USER='schellamuthu',CD='May 28 13:01 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">prior to any
deadline for the satisfaction of such conditions as set forth in the Restricted
Stock Award, the shares of Restricted Stock which have not vested shall be
forfeited, and the Committee may provide that (i)&nbsp;any purchase price paid
by the Eligible Individual be returned to the Eligible Individual or (ii)&nbsp;a
cash payment equal to the Restricted Stock&#146;s fair market value on the date of
forfeiture, if lower, be paid to the Eligible Individual.</font></h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
Committee may waive, in whole or in part, any or all of the conditions to
receipt of, or restrictions with respect to, any or all of the Eligible
Individual&#146;s Restricted Stock.</h3>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;7</font></b><font style="font-weight:normal;"><br>
</font>STOCK APPRECIATION RIGHTS</h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SARs may be granted at a price determined by the
Committee, and may be granted in tandem with an Option or independently of any
Option.&#160; If granted in tandem with an
Option, the exercise of the SAR or related Option will result in a forfeiture
of the right to exercise the related Option for an equivalent number of shares.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">An SAR may be exercised at such times as may be
specified in an Award Agreement, in whole or in installments, which may be
cumulative and shall expire at such time as the Committee shall determine at
the time of grant; provided that no SAR shall be exercisable later than ten (10)&nbsp;years
after the date granted.&#160; The Committee
may amend any SAR to accelerate the dates after which the SAR may be executed
in whole or in part.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SARs shall be exercised by the delivery of a written
notice of exercise to the Company setting forth the number of shares of Stock
with respect to which the SAR is to be exercised.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;8</font></b><font style="font-weight:normal;"><br>
</font>OTHER STOCK BASED AWARDS</h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Committee shall have complete discretion in
determining the number of shares of Stock subject to Other Stock Based Awards,
the consideration for such Awards and the terms, conditions and limitations
pertaining to same including, without limitation, restrictions based upon the
achievement of specific business objectives, tenure, and other measurements of
individual or business performance, and/or restrictions under applicable
federal or state securities laws, and conditions under which such Awards will
lapse.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Payment of Other Stock Based Awards may be in the form
of cash, shares, other Awards, or in such combinations thereof as the committee
shall determine at the time of grant, and with such restrictions as it may
impose.&#160; Payment may be made in a lump
sum or in installments as prescribed by the Committee.&#160; The Committee may also require or permit
Eligible Individuals to elect to defer the issuance of Stock or the settlement
of Awards in cash under such rules&nbsp;and procedures as it may establish
under the Plan.&#160; The Committee may also
provide that deferred settlements include the payment or crediting of interest
on the deferred amounts or the payment of crediting of dividends equivalent to
deterred amounts denominated in Stock.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\schella\05-8337-1\task455162\8337-1-ko.htm',USER='schellamuthu',CD='May 28 13:01 2005' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Committee may, at its sole discretion, direct the
Company to issue Stock subject to such restrictive legends and/or stock
transfer instructions as the Committee deems appropriate.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;9<br>TAX OFFSET PAYMENTS</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Committee may provide for a Tax Offset Payment to
be made by the Company to an Eligible Individual with respect to one or more
Awards granted under the Plan.&#160; The Tax
Offset Payment shall be in an amount specified by the Committee, which shall
not exceed the amount necessary to pay the federal, state, local and other
taxes payable with respect to the applicable Award, assuming that the Eligible
Individual is taxed at the maximum tax rate applicable to such income. &#160;The Tax Offset Payment shall be paid solely in
cash.&#160; No Eligible Individual shall be
granted a Tax Offset Payment for any fiscal year with respect to more than the
number of shares of Stock covered by Awards granted to such Eligible Individual
in such fiscal year.&#160; The terms and
conditions of a Tax Offset Payment Award shall be set forth in an Award
Agreement entered into between the Company and the Eligible Individual.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SECTION&nbsp;10<br>OPERATION AND ADMINISTRATION</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.1</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">General</font></i></b>.&#160; The operation and administration of this
Plan, including any Awards granted under this Plan, shall be subject to the
provisions of Section&nbsp;10.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Effective Dat</font></i></b><i><font style="font-style:italic;">e</font></i>.&#160; Subject to the approval of the shareholders
of the Company, the Plan shall be effective as of July&nbsp;24, 2000 (the &#147;Effective
Date&#148;) provided, however, that to the extent that Awards are granted under the
Plan prior to its approval by the shareholders of the Company, the Awards shall
be subject to the approval of the Plan by the shareholders of the Company.&#160; The term of the Plan shall be limited in
duration to ten (10)&nbsp;years from the earlier of (a)&nbsp;the Effective Date
or (b)&nbsp;the date the Plan is approved by the Company&#146;s shareholders.</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.3</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Shares Subject to Plan</font></i></b>.&#160; The shares of Stock for which Awards may be
granted under this Plan shall be subject to the following:</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Subject
to the following provisions of this Section&nbsp;10.3, the maximum aggregate
number of shares of Stock that may be issued and sold under the Plan shall be
the sum of (i)&nbsp;1,000,000 shares of Stock, (ii)&nbsp;any shares of Stock
available for future awards under the Company&#146;s 1994 Stock Option Plan and 1996
Director Stock Option Plan, in each case on the date such plan terminates on
its own terms or by action of the Board and (iii)&nbsp;any shares of Stock
covered by options granted under the Company&#146;s 1994 Stock Option Plan and 1996
Director Stock Option Plan which expire or are canceled without delivery of
shares of Stock.&#160; The number of shares of
Stock so reserved for issuance shall be subject to adjustment pursuant to
Sections 10.3 (b)&nbsp;and 10.3(d).&#160; The
shares of Stock may be authorized, but unissued, or reacquired Stock.</h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>On
September&nbsp;1st of each year, commencing with year 2001, the aggregate
number of shares of Stock that may be awarded under the Plan shall
automatically increase by the lesser of (i)&nbsp;300,000 shares of Stock, (ii)&nbsp;1%
of the outstanding shares of Stock on such date, or (iii)&nbsp;a lesser amount
determined by the Committee.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>To
the extent an Award terminates without having been exercised, or shares awarded
are forfeited, such shares shall again be available issue under the Plan.&#160; Shares of Stock surrendered in payment of the
Exercise Price and shares of Stock which are withheld in order to satisfy federal,
state or local tax liability, shall not count against the maximum aggregate
number of shares authorized to be issued pursuant to this Plan, and shall again
be available for issuance pursuant to the terms of the Plan.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>In
the event of any merger, reorganization, consolidation, sale of substantially
all assets, recapitalization, stock dividend, stock split, combination or
reverse stock split, spin-off, split-up, split-off, distribution of assets or
other change in corporate structure affecting the Stock, a substitution or
adjustment, as may be determined to be appropriate by the Committee or the
Board in its sole discretion, shall be made in the aggregate number of shares
reserved for issuance under the Plan.&#160; The
Board or Committee may make such other adjustments to participants&#146; Awards as
it deems appropriate to prevent substantial dilution or enlargement of the
rights granted to, or available for, participants in the Plan.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>No
Eligible Individual shall be granted Awards with respect to more than 400,000
shares of Stock in any fiscal year and up to an additional 750,000 shares of
Stock upon the initial hiring of such Eligible Individual (subject to
adjustment as provided in Section&nbsp;10.3(d)).</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h2 align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.4</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Securities Laws Restrictions</font></i></b>.&#160; Issuance of shares of Stock or other amounts
under the Plan shall be subject to the following:</h2>

<h2 align="left" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>If
at any time the Committee determines that the issuance of Stock under the Plan
is or may be unlawful under the laws of any applicable jurisdiction, the right
to exercise any Stock Option or receive any Restricted Stock shall be suspended
until the Committee determines that such issuance is lawful.&#160; The Company shall have no obligation to
effect any registration of qualification of the Stock under federal or state
laws.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
person exercising a Stock Option or receiving Restricted Stock shall make such
representations (including representations to the effect that such person will
not dispose of the Stock so acquired in violation of federal and state
securities laws) and furnish such information as may, in the opinion of counsel
for the Company, be appropriate to permit the</h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
